"Apart from religious association, Shishi are shown in
the vicinity of waterfalls, and amid rocks outof which
grow peonies, the King of Beasts with the King of
Flowers in poetical conjunction."

William H. Edmunds

-Pointers and Clues to the subject of Chinese and
Japanese Art- p.572

(Not much- but its a start.)

> Gentlemen:
> 
> I have seen the botan (peony) paired many times with
> a shishi on 
> tsuba and fuchi/kashira.
> 
> I was wondering, what is the connection between the
> two/what is the 
> theme?
> 
> Thanks,
> Ron P.
